title: Permanently suspended for no reason?
body: Today I got permanently suspended ( I can't login, not toxic behaviour) and it says check your email, but there is no email sent. What can i do now?

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see that you already have a ticket open.  Our account team will give some more context and help you out!  Make sure not to reply to the ticket until you receive a response, otherwise it could bump you back to the bottom of the queue.  They will respond to your ticket asap!

If you can't find an e-mail (be sure to check your spam folder if you haven't), then your best bet would be to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) asking about the information behind your ban.
thank you and the other Admins very much !
